issue.title: [R] Add ad hoc test of feather compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3872](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3872). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per `[~wesmckinn]`'s comments on [feather#232\|[https://github.com/wesm/feather/issues/232#issuecomment-438716427],] should have a script we can provide to:
 \* test that R arrow package's feather functions are drop-in replacements for [feather package on CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/feather/index.html)
 \* offer evidence to developers when we try to get people to migrate from **feather** package to **arrow**

cc `[~romainfrancois]` I'll do this one.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3872?focusedCommentId=17169017) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
<https://github.com/wesm/feather/pull/388> effectively did this
